description: Data was generated from file metadata for {---tag--program--} data in the GDC {---tag--archive--} archive for {---tag--release--} from {---tag--release-month-year--}. More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#{---tag--release-url--anchor--}

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file. This can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba44
fields.name: file_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this case (corresponds to the case_barcode).  Can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/cases/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba37
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: Original submitter case barcode, eg TCGA-DX-A8BN
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for sample one (corresponds to the sample_one_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5, associated with data file. May be null
fields.name: sample_one_gdc_id

fields.description: Submitter sample one barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A
fields.name: sample_one_barcode

fields.description: Sample type for sample one, eg Primary Tumor, Solid Tissue Normal
fields.name: sample_one_type_name

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for sample two (corresponds to the sample_two_barcode), when present for certain files (e.g. VCFs). Otherwise null
fields.name: sample_two_gdc_id

fields.description: Submitter sample two barcode, when present
fields.name: sample_two_barcode

fields.description: Sample type for sample two, eg Primary Tumor, Solid Tissue Normal, when present
fields.name: sample_two_type_name

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: The code representing a project within a program. For some programs, this can be a disease code.
fields.name: project_short_name_suffix

fields.description: Program name, eg TCGA or TARGET
fields.name: program_name

fields.description: Experimental source of the data type, eg Tissue slide image, RNA-Seq
fields.name: data_type

fields.description: Category description of the underlying data, eg Clinical, Raw Sequencing Data, Simple Nucleotide Variation, Transcriptome Profiling, etc
fields.name: data_category

fields.description: Experimental strategy used to generate data (where applicable) e.g. WXS, RNA-Seq
fields.name: experimental_strategy

fields.description: Description of the data, eg. clinical_supplement, aligned_reads
fields.name: file_type

fields.description: The size of a file measured in bytes
fields.name: file_size

fields.description: File format of the underlying data, eg BCR XML, BAM
fields.name: data_format

fields.description: Platform used to generate data (null, Illumina)
fields.name: platform

fields.description: GDC path to original BAM or VCF file
fields.name: file_name_key

fields.description: BAM or VCF index file GDC file UUID, when present
fields.name: index_file_id

fields.description: GDC path to original vcf or bam index file, when present
fields.name: index_file_name_key

fields.description: The size of the index file measured in bytes, when present
fields.name: index_file_size

fields.description: Data accessibility policy (open or controlled)
fields.name: access

fields.description: Access Control List -- if access is controlled, this field contains the dbGaP accession, eg phs000179
fields.name: acl
